name: Waste Events

metadata.exclusions: No known exclusions beyond documented table/model constraints.
metadata.confidence_notes: Validated against seeded demo dataset; verify against production policies before external reporting.

business_purpose: Tracks spoilage and damage losses for shrink and waste-cost analysis.

key_columns.name: estimated_cost
key_columns.business_meaning: Estimated direct cost impact of waste

common_queries: SELECT event_date, SUM(estimated_cost) FROM grocery_waste_events GROUP BY event_date
SELECT reason, COUNT(*) FROM grocery_waste_events GROUP BY reason
gotchas: Waste quantity and estimated_cost are operational estimates and may be reconciled later
